posts.post_content:
There are several fun spirits with sacrifice abilities.   
[Kami of False Hope](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kami of False Hope) will let you fog every turn for example.   
[Kami of Ancient Law](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kami of Ancient Law) destroys enchantments.   
[Moonlit Strider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Moonlit Strider) will protect your angel AND it has soul shift!
posts.html:
There are several fun spirits with sacrifice abilities.
Kami of False Hope will let you fog every turn for example.
Kami of Ancient Law destroys enchantments.
Moonlit Strider will protect your angel AND it has soul shift!

Posted By: wstonefi (10/26/2011 8:53:24 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Yay for Kamigawa block!!!
  
   
EDIT: I drew her during the Dark Ascension pre-release, but did not play her, now, at the release party, I drew her again, as well as [Requiem Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Requiem Angel). I built a white/green/blue (some) flyer deck which netted my 8 wins in 10 games.
  
   
I never once managed to use her ability because many of my flyers were either not spirits or they were just tokens. But other than that, she won me two games as a big flying beater alone.
  
   
Oh, and in the German flavor text, this shy girl suddenly turns into a guy. :|
posts.html:

I never once managed to use her ability because many of my flyers were either not spirits or they were just tokens. But other than that, she won me two games as a big flying beater alone.

Posted By: Lord_of_Tresserhorn (2/4/2012 10:47:53 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I know a lot of people hated on the name of this card when it was first spoiled, but I just read the Planeswalker's Guide to Avacyn Restored Part 1 (http://www.wizards.com/Magic/Magazine/Article.aspx?x=mtg/daily/feature/190c) which mentioned another angel of "Flight ." From this I can tell that a flight is a group of these angels, and Alabaster is the name of that specific flight. Knowing this, I hope her name is cooler to people than they were previously giving her credit for.  
  
That said, she can't go in any of my decks because I don't run enough spirits. But she's so great I'm tempted to just build an entirely new deck for her.
posts.html:

From this I can tell that a flight is a group of these angels, and Alabaster is the name of that specific flight. Knowing this, I hope her name is cooler to people than they were previously giving her credit for.

That said, she can't go in any of my decks because I don't run enough spirits. But she's so great I'm tempted to just build an entirely new deck for her.

Even after the [Geist of Saint Traft](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geist of Saint Traft) gets himself into trouble, his angel is here to bring him back from the brink again and again.

posts.post_content: Now I know I'm not the first to think about this, but you can easily use her with cards with changeling. Imagine running these and [Crib Swap](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crib Swap), or [Nameless Inversion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nameless Inversion). It's neat that they're making Angels that shoehorn into other tribal decks, like [Angelic Overseer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Angelic Overseer).

posts.post_content:
Let's do some consideration...  
  
A bad 5 mana angel -> [Starlit Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=4398).  
A good 5 mana angel -> [Melesse Spirit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=3502), [Angel of Light](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=20391).  
A very good 5 mana angel -> [Serra Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=205234), [Shepherd of the Lost](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=193399), [Angel of Flight Alabaster](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=230620).  
A too good 5 mana angel -> [Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=191065), [Angelic Overseer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=220370).
posts.html:
Let's do some consideration...

A bad 5 mana angel -> Starlit Angel.
A good 5 mana angel -> Melesse Spirit, Angel of Light.
A very good 5 mana angel -> Serra Angel, Shepherd of the Lost, Angel of Flight Alabaster.
A too good 5 mana angel -> Baneslayer Angel, Angelic Overseer.
